content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to be a great place to live. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm interested in the apartment, but I'm looking to negotiate the best price. Could we start with a lower offer?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Certainly, Farhad. I'm open to considering your offer. What price were you thinking of?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I was hoping to start around 800 Euros per month. This seems like a fair price considering the location and the amenities.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 800 Euros per month is indeed a competitive price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center. However, I must mention that due to the current demand, I have been receiving offers slightly above this amount. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that there may be higher offers, but I'm willing to pay 850 Euros per month. This is my final offer, as I believe it reflects a fair market value for the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your offer of 850 Euros per month is very close to my asking price. However, I'm hoping to find a tenant who can appreciate the quality of the apartment and the prime location. Would you be willing to go a little higher? Perhaps 900 Euros per month? This would be a fair deal for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate the quality of the apartment and the location. However, my budget does not allow me to go above 850 Euros per month. This is my final offer. If you are willing to accept this price, I would be happy to proceed with the rental agreement.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept 850 Euros per month. The apartment is worth more than that, and I'm sure you understand that I need to find a tenant who is willing to pay a fair price for the property. If you're not willing to go higher, I'll have to consider other offers.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I respect your position, Mister Schmidt. However, 850 Euros per month is my absolute limit. I'm a student and have a strict budget. If you cannot accept this price, I will have to reconsider my options.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your situation, Farhad. As a landlord, I have to balance the needs of my tenants with the value of my property. I'm willing to negotiate, but I cannot go below a certain threshold. If 850 Euros per month is your final offer, I'm afraid I cannot accept it. I would recommend you look for other apartments that fit within your budget.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time, Mister Schmidt. It was nice meeting you. I will consider other options that align better with my budget. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: You're welcome, Farhad. I'm sorry we couldn't come to an agreement, but I wish you the best of luck in finding a suitable apartment. Please let me know if you have any further questions or if you change your mind about the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I will keep your offer in mind, but I must stick to my budget. If there's anything else you can provide to make the apartment more affordable, please let me know. Otherwise, I believe it's best to terminate the negotiation at this time.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your position, Farhad. Unfortunately, I cannot make any further concessions on the price. If you decide to reconsider or if your budget changes, I would be happy to hear from you. Until then, I wish you the best of luck in your search for a new home. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
